CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( et4ae5__SendStatus__c , "Scheduled") && et4ae5__Scheduled_Date_Time__c <= NOW() , $Label.et4ae5__queuedFP , IF( ISPICKVAL(et4ae5__SendStatus__c , "Pending Tracking Subscription" ) , $Label.et4ae5__completed , TEXT( et4ae5__SendStatus__c ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This status can differ from the email status in Marketing Cloud.
CustomField.label: Send Status
